title: Katie Melua
summary: Ketevan "Katie" Melua (/ˈmɛluːə/;[3] Georgian: ქეთევან "ქეთი" მელუა, IPA: [kʰɛtʰɛvɑn mɛluɑ];[4] born 16 September 1984) is a Georgian-British singer and songwriter. She moved to the United Kingdom at the age of eight – first to Belfast, and then to London in 1999.[5] Melua is signed to the small Dramatico record label, under the management of composer Mike Batt,[6] and made her musical debut in 2003. In 2006, she became the United Kingdom's best-selling female artist[7] and Europe's highest selling European female artist.[8]
